activities: Employee personal data that is required within the course of the employment relationship is (i) collected and stored by local offices of Con-way's affiliate companies, (ii)transferred to a central storage location within the EU, (iii) transferred to local third party benefits and payroll administrators, and (iv) transferred to the United States for storage and disaster recovery purposes and for various employment-related purposes.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Finland, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Con-way and its affiliate companies only process human resources personal data; therefore, Con-way submits to the authority of the European Data Protection authorities (EU DPAs) for all unresolved complaints.
